page.title: 19EVENTS IN WORLINGTON
page.content: Events are organized by different groups.W.I. have an Xmas meal & an outing.They recently had a coffee morning.The choir have an outing & an Xmas party.The church fete is in Lady Stevens garden in August.Last Summer The Parish held a Worli_Olympics & an Inter Parish Quizz.This year school visits have included Combe Sydenham Hall,Northcott Theatre,Bickleigh Castle,Buckland Abbey & the Badger Sanctuary.At Xmas we put on a show & we have had a coffee morning & 2 parties.The Beaford Centre organized a Mime & Puppet Show & we have had a talk by a Commonwealth Lecturer from India. P.T.A. have had a dance,coffee evening,pet show/barbecue/sports ,2 educational talks & a Parish walk. Playgroup have had a coffee morning & carboot sale.Mrs.Fiske's pupils recently gave a charity piano recital.
